text.div:
COVID_19 (Tests for SARS_CoV_2 IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    94506-3 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94508-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
    94547-7 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94564-2 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
    94661-6 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Interpretation] in Serum or Plasma
    95428-9 SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum or Plasma by Immunofluorescence
